articles.title: NYC rents skyrocket amid record-high inflation rates - New York Post
articles.description: So far, the median asking rent in Manhattan is up 27 percent this month compared to last year and up 4 percent compared to Nov. 2019.
articles.content: As New Yorkers struggle with higher gas and grocery prices amid record-high inflation rates, the cost of rent is also increasing — and isnt expected to level off anytime soon, according to data and e… [+5241 chars]
